content.question: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the rules for debate used by the United States House of Representatives and the United States Senate?

choices.label: House of Representatives Senate Debate is unlimited. Debate is unlimited.
House of Representatives Senate Members can filibuster. Members cannot filibuster.
House of Representatives Senate Debate is limited. Members can filibuster.
House of Representatives Senate Members cannot filibuster. Only the majority leader can filibuster.

content.answer: House of Representatives Senate Debate is limited. Members can filibuster.

topic.text: 2.1: Congress: The Senate and the House of Representatives

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
